name: Oil Sheik
description:
Oil Sheik is a strategic, turn based, board game. 4 players compete with each other for fortune and glory.

- Strategically place your Blips on a game board to benefit you or hinder your opponents.
- Trade Shares of 8 companies (buy low, sell high!) each having their own pros and cons.
- Expand and Merge companies for extra monetary benefits and bonuses.
- Become the next Oil Sheik by outclassing all your opponents.
- Earn in-game rewards (Experience, Ranks, customizable in-game profile pictures and other display art)
